scripts.setup: cd server && yarn --silent && cd .. && cd dinrestaurang && yarn --silent --ignore-scripts && cd .. && cd adminpanel && yarn --silent --ignore-scripts
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd dinrestaurang && yarn dev"
scripts.clear: rimraf node_modules dist build && cd server && rimraf node_modules dist build && cd .. && cd dinrestaurang && rimraf node_modules dist build && cd .. && cd adminpanel && rimraf node_modules dist build
